nodes.text: Javelin was a group of 4 Corellian corvettes used by the Galactic Empire.

The corvettes, along with multiple stormtrooper transports, were part of an operation to capture a B-wing prototype of Shantipole Project. While the first prototype was unarmed, the second was and was able to provide cover for the Verpine corvette Shantipole and the shuttle Falcon which would pick up Admiral Ackbar. The prototype, along with some X-wings managed to destroy all of the corvettes and transports, allowing the Shantipole to escape. The event was recorded and recreated to train future Rebel pilots.
